object.name: PollOption
object.description: This object contains information about one answer option in a poll.
object.html_description: This object contains information about one answer option in a poll.
object.rst_description: This object contains information about one answer option in a poll.

annotations.description: Special entities that appear in the option text. Currently, only custom emoji entities are allowed in poll option texts
annotations.html_description: Optional. Special entities that appear in the option text. Currently, only custom emoji entities are allowed in poll option texts
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Special entities that appear in the option *text*. Currently, only custom emoji entities are allowed in poll option texts
annotations.name: text_entities

annotations.description: Number of users that voted for this option
annotations.html_description: Number of users that voted for this option
annotations.rst_description: Number of users that voted for this option
annotations.name: voter_count
